backend/main.mo: Actor providing user profiles, proposal responses, invite-code handling, and mining-related endpoints with access control.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old actor state to new schema by adding empty mining-related maps.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report listing feature requirements, associated files, components, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of various frontend components, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base/theme definitions with miningâ€‘themed OKLCH color variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting page metadata and loading the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component applying theme provider and rendering the MiningAppShell with notifications.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading states and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/MiningAppShell.t: Main authenticated layout managing navigation, login flow, profile setup, and routing between dashboard, settings, and payouts.
Displays mining status, runtime, earnings, and recent events with controls to start or stop mining.
frontend/src/components/MiningHeader.tsx: Renders the top navigation bar for switching between dashboard, settings, and payouts.
frontend/src/components/MiningSettings.t: Provides a form to view and update mining configuration values like hashrate, power usage, and payout address.
frontend/src/components/Payouts.tsx: Allows users to request payouts and view payout history based on available mining earnings.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting the user to enter and save their name when first setting up a profile.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, managing login, logout, identity loading, and auth client setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useMining.ts: React-query hooks for fetching and mutating mining config, state, events, and starting/stopping mining via the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/usePayouts.ts: Hooks to fetch payout history and request new payouts, with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Hooks for loading, saving, and checking admin status of the caller's user profile.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base/theme setup defining light/dark OKLCH color variables and utility animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entrypoint initializing React Query and Internet Identity, then rendering App.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning hash parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration with custom colors, typography, container queries, animations, and theme extensions.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing state, requirements, feature list, and image needs.
